fields.name: Splitting Gale (C1)
fields.value: Fires 2 additional arrows per Aimed Shot, each dealing 33% of the original arrow's DMG.

fields.name: Breeze of Reminiscence (C2)
fields.value:
Skyward Sonnet decreases enemy Anemo RES by 12% for 10s.
Enemies launched by Skyward Sonnet suffer an additional 12% Anemo RES and Physical RES decrease while airborne.

fields.name: Ode to Thousand Winds (C3)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of Wind's Grand Ode by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Hurricane of Freedom (C4)
fields.value: When Venti picks up an Elemental Orb or Particle, he receives a 25% Anemo DMG Bonus for 10s.

fields.name: Concierto dal Cielo (C5)
fields.value:
Increase the Level of Skyward Sonnet by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Storm of Defiance (C6)
fields.value:
Targets who take DMG from Wind's Grand Ode have their Anemo RES decreased by 20%.
If an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.
